item.title: Super Slash 'n Grab
item.description: Overview Description Super Slash ‘n Grab is a four-player “hack and stash” game in the style of arcade classics like Gauntlet. Players take on the role of a group of thieves who are on a quest to retrieve their stolen Thieves’ Code from the evil King’s Guard. While players are technically working as a team, their true objective is to be the richest thieves at the end of each level.
